About Me

Let me tell you a few tings about Sam...

BIO

I am a web developer from NYC and current student of full-stack web development career track at Thinkful: Bloc. What drives me about coding is solving problems and theory-crafting new ideas that come to life on-page. I pride myself in learning new things, styles and methods, the various types of frameworks that makes front-end and back-end sync together. I work well with HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. When I'm not coding, I'm a tech, an avid video gamer (some say a force to be reckoned with), Ebike enthusiast who loves to travel throughout the city (go green), years of computer science experience flowing through my veins, I can't keep tech out of my hands.
